ResourceFeature.Name: Charm of Feather Falling
ResourceFeature.Text: This charm grants you the benefits of a ring of feather falling. These benefits last for 10 days, after which the charm vanishes from you.

Feature.Name: Charm of Heroism
Feature.Text: This charm allows you to give yourself the benefit of a potion of heroism as an action. Once you do so, the charm vanishes from you.

MultiFeature.Name: Charm of Restoration
MultiFeature.Text: This charm has 6 charges. You can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells: greater restoration (4 charges) or lesser restoration (2 charges). Once all its charges have been expended, the charm vanishes from you.

ResourceFeature.Name: Charm of the Slayer
ResourceFeature.Text: One sword in your possession becomes a dragon slayer or giant slayer (DM's choice) for the next 9 days. The charm then vanishes from you and the weapon returns to normal.
